name: Ariaria International Market
description: One of the largest markets in West Africa, ideal for shopping local textiles, footwear, and electronics.

name: National Museum of Colonial History
description: Explore Nigeria’s colonial past with rare artifacts, historical documents, and exhibitions.

name: Enyimba Stadium
description: Catch a match or tour the home of Enyimba FC, one of Nigeria’s most successful football clubs.

name: Cenotaph Aba (Aba Memorial Park)
description: A peaceful monument commemorating war heroes, perfect for history lovers and reflection.

name: Ngwa Road Textile Market
description: Discover colorful African prints, fabrics, and tailoring craft from local designers.

name: Azumini Blue River
description: Located just outside Aba, this natural clear-blue river offers canoe rides, picnics, and swimming.

name: Shoprite Aba (Osisioma)
description: Modern shopping, food courts, and entertainment all in one accessible location.

name: Brass Monkey Restaurant & Lounge
description: Trendy spot for local dishes, drinks, and nightlife in a relaxed atmosphere.

name: TONIMAS Event Centre
description: Frequent host of local events, trade fairs, and cultural showcases — great for networking.

name: Aba Sports Club
description: A family-friendly spot with tennis courts, a swimming pool, and recreational activities.
